title: Watch: Passengers scream as Arik Air Boeing flight's left engine destroyed mid-air; plane makes emergency landing
summary_full: An Arik Air Boeing 737 experienced a terrifying mid-air incident when its left engine exploded en route to Port Harcourt. Passengers witnessed the shredded engine as the plane made a safe emergency landing in Benin on a single engine. While no injuries were reported, the aircraft sustained significant damage, prompting an investigation into the cause.
